line_2: Whene'er it pleases her to speak,

line_1: OH stay, oh stay! thy rash speed check,
line_2: Not yet ascend the flying deck;

line_1: Foes, which his lamp had sov'reign power to check,
line_2: But that you see is falling from his neck;

line_1: No longer strives the gushing tears to check;
line_2: Then clasping round his youngest brother's neck,

line_1: Soft as the downy bloom on Cloe's check,
line_2: Smooth as the polish'd ivory of her neck,

line_1: Charm with soft tones, with tender touches check,
line_2: Bend to your golden yoke his willing neck,

line_1: Thine the sons of Pride to check,
line_2: And to bend the stubborn neck,

line_1: Till whirl'd aloft he falls; a timely check,
line_2: Enough to dislocate his worthless neck:
